channel.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
channel.description:
Hello. I got some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
1.) Where can i change the Starter Pack? [answered]
2.) Some Runecrafting Altars arent working (Astral, Death, Nature). When i click on them nothing happens How can i fix them?
3.) When i level Hunter it shows an anvil in the Interface. How can i change it to the Hunter one?
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/23qxic5.png[/img]
4.) How can i change the color of the Client? (making the frame blue for example)
5.) I want that the statues at mage bank give you the capes. How can I add this?
Ty for your help

item.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

making statues give capes is easy as pie

  1. going to clicking objects.java find the statue case if doesn’t exsist make one
  2. make it so if object is clicked a animation “what ever you want happens”
  3. then make it give you a cape.

Easy!

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
item.dc:creator: @rspscode rspscode
item.description:
@rspscode wrote:

Bump

Can some1 help me with the rest?

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

1.) Where can i change the Starter Pack?

-playerassistant

2.) Some Runecrafting Altars arent working (Astral, Death, Nature). When i click on them nothing happens
How can i fix them?

clickobject, actionhandler, runecrafting class one of them

3.) When i level Hunter it shows an anvil in the Interface.
How can i change it to the Hunter one?

find out what interface is showing to appear server sided and then see if it’s just a typo or if you need to replace the cache.

4.) How can i change the color of the Client? (making the frame blue for example)

assuming you mean the bar at top?

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
item.dc:creator: @rspscode rspscode
item.description:
@rspscode wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:527665”]1: check playerassistant or client.
2: you’ll have to add support for them in the runecrafting skill class.
3: client sided I believe.
4: are you referring the the Jframe? If so, themes.[/quote]
Ty.
How do i add the support?
And what do i have to change in Jframe?

Another Question:
How can i add the edge wildy? So that edgeville north is wildy?

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

1: check playerassistant or client.
2: you’ll have to add support for them in the runecrafting skill class.
3: client sided I believe.
4: are you referring the the Jframe? If so, themes.
